name: InlinePresentationIntent
desc: A type that defines presentation intent for runs of characters for traits like emphasis, strikethrough, and code voice.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates an inline presentation intent using the raw value you specify.

items.name: static var code: InlinePresentationIntent
items.desc: An intent that represents a code voice presentation.

items.name: static var emphasized: InlinePresentationIntent
items.desc: An intent that represents an emphasized presentation.

items.name: static var lineBreak: InlinePresentationIntent
items.desc: An intent that represents a line break.

items.name: static var softBreak: InlinePresentationIntent
items.desc: An intent that represents a soft line break.

items.name: static var strikethrough: InlinePresentationIntent
items.desc: An intent that represents a strikethrough presentation.

items.name: static var stronglyEmphasized: InlinePresentationIntent
items.desc: An intent that represents a strongly emphasized presentation.
